name: Sewer Sword
description:
WASD or arrow keys - move, jump and roll

Space key - attack

¨Sewer Sword" chronicles the epic clash between a brave mouse warrior defending his village from a powerful draco-feline creature that terrorizes the local residents.

WASD ou setas  - mover, pular e rolar

Espaço - ataque

¨Sewer Sword" narra o embate épico entre um corajoso rato guerreiro defendendo sua vila de uma poderosa criatura draco-felina que aterroriza os moradores locais.
